snippet: New York courts may be reforming hiring practices so that jobs are not given to favored friends and relatives, but one justice has been given a pass for doing so.
abstract: Editorial criticizes the New York State Commission on Judicial Conduct for not taking action against Judge Luis Gonzalez, who was charged with hiring friends and relatives who were unqualified for their positions; urges Gonzalez to relinquish his position.
lead_paragraph: New York courts may be reforming hiring practices so that jobs are not given to favored friends and relatives, but one justice has been given a pass for doing so.
